text: (visvasavantayini!) dharma karanavanhi oba samaga viruddhava yuddha nokarannantada, obage nivesvalin obava pitamam nokala ayatada, oba krtagna novanu yayida, ovun samaga oba sadharana lesa katayutu nokala yutuya yayida, allah obava valakva hÃ¦riye nÃ¦ta. niyata vasayenma allah viniscayakaruvanva priya karanneku vasayenma sitinneya
